project_descr: Disaster Risk Reduction - Aceh (DRRA) is designed to make disaster risk reduction a normal part of the development process.

outputs.output_descr: TDMRC-UNSYIAH strengthened to provide science-based information, service and knowledge assistance to the local government and other Disaster Risk Reduction(DRR) proponents in implementing their DRR activities.
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA

outputs.output_descr: An Institutional arrangment and an enabling environment are established to facilitate the participatory and concerted implementation of Disaster Risk Reduction measures
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA

outputs.output_descr: Demonstrations of gender sensitive projects are implemented in selected locations to test and improve measures for reducing disaster risk from natural disaster
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA

outputs.output_descr: Disaster Risk Reduction public awareness programmes implemented to promote internalization of a gender sensitive “Culture of Safety” among the people and institutions of Aceh
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA

outputs.output_descr: The overall project is effectively and efficiently managed, monitored, evaluated and audited.
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
